title: How to Make Hershey's Best Brownies

steps.headline: Grease a 13 by 9 by 2 inch (5.1 cm) baking pan.
Put butter in the microwave for 2 minutes or until melted.
Stir in the sugar and the vanilla.
Add eggs one at a time beating well with a spoon.
Add cocoa and beat until well blended.
Add flour, baking powder and salt beating well.
Stir in nuts if you want.
Pour the batter into the greased baking pan.
Cool the brownies in the pan.
Cut the brownies into bars when they have cooled and enjoy!

text: Heat your oven to 350ºF or 180ºC.  Grease a 13 by 9 by 2 inch (5.1 cm) baking pan.  Put butter in the microwave for 2 minutes or until melted.  Stir in the sugar and the vanilla.  Add eggs one at a time beating well with a spoon.  Add cocoa and beat until well blended.  Add flour, baking powder and salt beating well.  Stir in nuts if you want.  Pour the batter into the greased baking pan.  Bake the brownies for 30-35 minutes.  Cool the brownies in the pan.  Cut the brownies into bars when they have cooled and enjoy!  Finished.
